author: Jessica
title: Kohl’s: KitchenAid 5-Speed Hand Mixer or Hand Blender Only $25.49 Each (Regularly $59.99)
text:
Grab great buys on KitchenAid Small Appliances! Hop on over to Kohls.com where this KitchenAid 5-Speed Hand Mixer in Aqua or Gray is marked down to just $39.99 (regularly $59.99) and/or this KitchenAid 2-Speed Hand Blender is on sale for just $39.99 (regularly $59.99) available in 9 different vibrant colors .
Even better, through tomorrow, March 12th, you can save $10 off a $25 purchase when you use promo code LUCKY at checkout. AND if you haven’t already, sign up for Kohl’s text alerts by texting SAVE24 to 56457 for a unique code good for 15% off your purchase. Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $8.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pickup if available at a store near you.
Kohl’s.com Deal Ideas: 
KitchenAid 5-Speed Hand Mixer $39.99 (regularly $59.99) 
Use the code LUCKY ($10 off $25)
Use the 15% off code when you text SAVE24 to 56457 
Final Cost $25.49!

KitchenAid 2-Speed Hand Blender $39.99 (regularly $59.99) 
Use the code LUCKY ($10 off $25)
Use the 15% off code when you text SAVE24 to 56457 
Final Cost $25.49!
